attributes.action: stop retrospective nature of air flight tax budget increase
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The recent budget announcement to double air flight taxes from Feb 2007 will apply retrospectively to everyone flying after that date even if they purchased the tickets a year before the budget announcement. 

It's a bit like buying a tank of fuel a few weeks ago, having a budget announcement of fuel tax increases and then retrospectively charging anyone who has not yet used this fuel.

To avoid this being viewed as a money raising exercise and to be fair and wise ,they should not apply the increases to anyone who booked the flights prior to the budget announcement.
